Title: Requires health and motor vehicle insurance policies to notify policyholders of cancellation, discontinuance or major changes to their policy via email
Summary: Requires health and motor vehicle insurance policies to notify policyholders of cancellation, discontinuance or major changes to their policy via email and to offer paperless notification upon the issuance of such policies.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring health and motor vehicle insurance policies to notify policyholders of cancellation, discontinuance or major changes to their policy via email and to offer paperless notification upon the issuance of such policies
